mapper.select: SELECT j.*, a.host_id, a.name AS accommodationName, a.location FROM ( SELECT p.payment_id, p.guest_id, u.name AS guestName, p.check_in, p.check_out, p.accommodation_id FROM payments p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.guest_id = u.user_id WHERE p.pay_status = '완료' AND p.check_in > NOW() ) j LEFT JOIN accommodations a ON j.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id WHERE a.host_id = #{hostId}

SELECT j.*, a.host_id, a.name AS accommodationName, a.location FROM ( SELECT p.payment_id, p.guest_id, u.name AS guestName, p.check_in, p.check_out, p.accommodation_id FROM payments p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.guest_id = u.user_id WHERE p.pay_status = '완료' ) j LEFT JOIN accommodations a ON j.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id WHERE a.host_id = #{hostId} AND DATE(j.check_in) IN (CURDATE(), CURDATE() + INTERVAL 1 DAY)

SELECT j.*, a.host_id, a.name AS accommodationName, a.location FROM ( SELECT p.payment_id, p.guest_id, u.name AS guestName, p.check_in, p.check_out, p.accommodation_id FROM payments p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.guest_id = u.user_id WHERE p.pay_status = '완료' ) j LEFT JOIN accommodations a ON j.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id WHERE a.host_id = #{hostId} AND j.check_in < NOW() AND j.check_out > NOW()
